theies: [1]Chen GL, Sun GZ, Zhang YQ, Mo ZY .Study on Parallel Computing. Journal of Computer Science and Technology, 2006, 21(5):665-673.
[2]Zhang YQ, Chen GL, Sun GZ, Miao QK. Models of Parallel Computation: A survey and Classification. Frontiers of Computer science in China, 2007, 1(2):156-165.
[3]Zhang D, Liu YH, Guo XN, Ni LM.RASS: A Real-time, Accurate and Scalable System for Tracking Transceiver-free 0bjects. IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems, 2012.
[4]Zhang D, Liu YH, Guo XN, Ni LM. On Distinguishing the Multiple Radio Paths in RSS-based Ranging. Proc. of the 31th Annual IEEE Int’l Conf. on computer Communications (InfoCom), 2012.

[5]Zhang D, Liu YH, NiLM. Link-Centric Probabilistic Coverage Model for Transceiver-free0bject Detection in Wireless Networks. Proc. of the 30th Int’l Conf. on Distributed Computing Systems(ICDCs), 2010:116-125.
[6]Zhang D, Yang YY, Cheng DC, Liu SY, Ni LM. COCKTAIL: An RF-based Hybrid Approach for Indoor Localization. Proc. of IEEE Int’l Communications Conf. (ICC),2010:1-5.
[7]Zhang D, Ni LM. Dynamic Clustering for Tracking Multiple Transceiver-free Objects. Proc. of the 7th Annual IEEE Int’l Conf. on Pervasive Computing and Communications (PerCom), 2009:1-8.
[8]Zhang D, Ma J, Chen QB, Ni LM. An RF-based System for Tracking Transceiver-free Objects. Proc. of the 5th Annual IEEE Int’l Conf. on Pervasive Computing and communications(PerCom), 2007∶ 135-144.
[9]Guo XN, Zhang D, Ni LM. Localizing Multiple Objects in an RF-based Dynamic Environment. Proc. of the 32nd Int’l Conf. on Distributed Computing Systems, 2012.
[10]Lu KZ, Chen GL, Feng YH, Liu G, MaO R. Approximation Algorithm for Minimizing Relay Node Placement in Wireless sensor Networks. Science China Information Sciences, 2010,53(11)∶ 2332-2342.
[11]Lu KZ, Xiang XH, Zhang D, Mao R, Feng YH. Localization Algorithm Based on Maximum a Posteriori in Wireless Sensor Networks. International Journal of Distributed Sensor Networks,2012.
[12]Lu KZ, Liu G, Mao R, Feng YH. Relay Node Placement Based on Balancing Power Consumption in Wireless Sensor Networks. IET Wireless Sensor Systems, 2011,1(1):1-6.
[13]Mao R, Miranker WL, Miranker DP. Dimension Reduction for Distance-Based Indexing. Proc. of the 3rd Int. Conf. on SImilarity Search and Applications(SISAP),2010:25-32.
[14]Mao, Rui ; Ramakrishnan, Smriti, R. ; Nuckolls, Glen ; Miranker, Daniel, P. An inverted index for mass spectra similarity query and comparison with a metric-space method: case study.
